posts.post_title: Mordecai Brown port Pied 150 PSA AA
posts.post_content: Three Finger Brown portrait. Pied 150.  Beautiful card with tons of eye appeal. Crisp colors. No creases. Guessing tad short. Lot of look for the money $645. I'll be happy to email pics. [url]norwoodclassics@gmail.com[/url] SOLD
